name: Bluu
description:
Bluu, an yong alien lost in a far away planet called polygon. He is looking for his brother Sam that was kidnaped by strangers. He gotta be fast to go through all challenges he might face when looking for his brother.  There will be enemies, traps all sort of strugles along the way.

You can help him find his brother and bring him back home.

Github repo: Bluu
